mapper.insert:
select room_seq.nextval from dual
insert into room values(#{accommodationNo}, #{roomNo}, #{roomName}, #{roomPrice}, #{roomUseNumber})
mapper.update: update room set room_name=#{roomName}, room_price=#{roomPrice}, room_use_number=#{roomUseNumber} where accommodation_no=#{accommodationNo} and room_no=#{roomNo}
mapper.delete: delete from room where accommodation_no=#{accommodationNo} and room_no=#{roomNo}
mapper.select: select room_no from room where room_name=#{roomName} and accommodation_no=#{accommodationNo}
